main event: On August 9, 1965, a civilian observer reported seeing a strange object in the sky while watching from his patio in Hollywood Hills.
interesting points: The object was described as a silvery, semi-transparent, cigar-shaped object approximately 30-40 feet long and 10-12 feet wide,The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes,The observer initially thought it was a meteor but noted it was moving too slowly,The report indicated that the object resembled a satellite but appeared to be directed at will,There were many airplanes in the sky at the time, which helped the observer confirm it was not an airplane.
witness description: A civilian observer with family and a friend, including his wife, son, and step-son
